value.title: QuietNet - is like a filter for the internet. – Block ads, trackers, and threats — for every device, all in one place
value.content:
Quietnet blocks ads, tracking, and harmful websites before they even reach your phone, laptop, or TV — no apps needed, and it works for every device in your home or office.
We make the internet faster, safer, and more private for families and small businesses — without the noise.
We're not backed by big tech or VC money. We're privacy-focused, bootstrapped, and already seeing people pay for peace and quiet online.
QuietNet is built by people who care — no ads, no tracking, just a cleaner, safer internet for your family or team.
View startup

value.title: Voxtara – AI Speech Coach to Improve Public Speaking Skills Regardless of Your Skills
value.content:
Voxtara is your personal AI speech coach that helps you become 
a more confident and effective public speaker. Whether you're 
preparing for a big presentation, teaching a class, or pitching 
to investors, Voxtara provides instant, actionable feedback to 
help you improve.
Key Features:
• AI-Powered Analysis: Get comprehensive feedback on clarity, 
  pacing, confidence, engagement, and body language
• Video Recording: Record practice sessions up to 5 minutes
• Deep-Dive Reports: Detailed analysis
• Progress Tracking: Watch your speaking skills improve over 
  time with detailed analytics
• Practice Reminders: Set custom reminders
• Session History: Review past performances
View startup

value.title: Stellar Hosted – Managed open-source business Software as a Service hosted in Europe/EU
value.content:
Stellar Hosted is a managed hosting platform for open-source business software. We help teams deploy, secure, and maintain popular open-source tools like BookStack, Metabase, Superset, GitLab, SonarQube, and more, on fully managed infrastructure in the EU. Each instance is private, scalable, and optimized for performance and reliability, so you can focus on using the software instead of maintaining it.
With Stellar Hosted you get transparent pricing, zero vendor lock-in, and a commitment to open source, 10% of our revenue goes back to the projects we host. We make running open-source applications as simple and dependable as SaaS but with full control and data ownership.
View startup

value.title: GoodMetrics – A better alternative to Google Analytics
value.content:
GoodMetrics is a web analytics tool built for people who want clear, actionable insights without the headaches of GA4. It shows you where your traffic comes from, what drives conversions, and which content performs best — all in a privacy-friendly way.
Unlike Google Analytics, GoodMetrics doesn’t rely on cookies or personal data — so you get full visibility without the privacy trade-offs. Data appears instantly, reports stay consistent, and you’ll always know what’s happening on your site in real time.
View startup

value.title: Prismatic Forge – Knowledge Graph-Backed LLM with Citations, Tasks, and Multi-Agent Workflows
value.content:
We've built a system that combines a semantic knowledge graph with LLM agents to create what we call an "Adaptive Productivity System." It's not just another AI chat - it's a complete rethinking of how knowledge work gets done.
Every LLM query automatically searches your personal/organizational knowledge graph first, providing cited responses that link back to your actual data. But here's where it gets interesting:
  Ask "What's the status of Project X?" and get a response with citations from your emails [1], documents [2], and task system [3]. Click any citation to jump to the source. Assign follow-up tasks that trigger multi-agent workflows.
View startup

value.title: Criticly – Turn any text into deep insights
value.content:
Criticly is a minimal MacOS app helps you refine ideas, challenge assumptions, and clarify your thoughts — instantly, on any selected text.
View startup

value.title: Friendify – Build AI-powered Discord bots without code
value.content:
Friendify is a platform for building and managing AI-powered Discord bots without writing any code. You can customize bots with distinct AI personalities for more natural conversations and use advanced speech-to-text to let them interact in voice channels. It provides a single dashboard to create, deploy, and monitor all your bots, helping community managers automate tasks and improve engagement.
View startup

value.title: Catalystar – Catalystar is an AI-native scientific workflow intelligence platform
value.content:
Catalystar is a healthcare and life-science intelligence platform designed for the age of information overload. Built for researchers, educators, and biotech innovators, Catalystar ingests PDFs and DOIs, suggests evidence-linked ideas with citation chips, and helps structure them into publish-ready drafts complete with deterministic bibliographies. Unlike black-box AI tools, Catalystar preserves provenance at every step, making trust and transparency core to the workflow. With Catalystar, teams cut tool switches by 4×, draft 65% denser context in less than half the time, and keep every idea backed by verifiable sources.
View startup

value.title: Maton – AI coworker for your repetitive admin work
value.content:
Maton is your AI coworker that takes care of repetitive admin work across your emails, spreadsheets, CRMs, and more so you can focus on what really matters.
Automating tasks is as easy as asking "Update Salesforce based on recent customer emails" or "Send me a summary of #support channel every morning"
View startup

value.title: Email Reminder – Turn your inbox into a simple reminder system
value.content:
Email Reminder is built for busy professionals, freelancers, and small business owners who live in their email inbox. Instead of juggling task apps, you can create simple one-time or recurring reminders that arrive exactly when you need them. Flexible scheduling (hourly, daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, bi-monthly, yearly, or fully custom). Manage everything in a clean, minimal dashboard. Free tier + paid plans, with AppSumo lifetime deal support. It’s the easiest way to keep important tasks top of mind without changing your workflow.
View startup

value.title: Apprvd – A radically simple contract platform with powerful, AI-enhanced features
value.content:
Apprvd is a simple contract management platform for small and growing teams. It lets you draft from templates, flag risky clauses with AI, and collaborate in a web editor instead of passing Word docs around. Contracts can be signed securely, tracked for renewals and obligations, and searched easily so nothing slips through the cracks. It’s an affordable way to keep deals moving while staying in control.
View startup

value.title: creafico – AI video analysis to increase engagement and grow faster on Reels or TikTok
value.content:
creafico is an AI‑powered analysis tool for short‑form videos. Upload your video, and it pinpoints weak hooks, pacing slips, and retention dips, then delivers clear, time‑stamped tips to fix them. With faster feedback you can sharpen each clip, boost engagement, and grow quicker on social media.
View startup

value.title: Uplogr – Uplogr is a social changelog platform for builders
value.content:
Uplogr is a social changelog platform that helps indie builders and product teams share updates, track progress, and build in public. Users can share updates, maintain a public changelog, and stay consistent with build streaks. Pro features like feedback collection, polls, shareable questionnaires and a knowledge base make it easy to engage your audience and grow with your community.
View startup

value.title: 120 AI Chat – An AI chat app that feels instant.
value.content:
120 AI Chat is a native desktop client built for speed and reliability, not a slow web wrapper. Designed for macOS (with Windows and Linux coming soon), it lets you run multiple chat threads, use reasoning models, generate images with models like GPT Image 1 or Stable Diffusion, connect to Hugging Face or OpenRouter, etc.
120 AI Chat gives developers, writers, and everyday users a tool they enjoy using, with more on the way—like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Model Context Protocol (MCP), and full Windows and Linux support.
View startup

value.title: PosCow – Squarespace e-commerce plugin for international sales
value.content:
Upgrade Squarespace store to enable global shopping. Get instant international shipping quotes, AI-generated social content, automatic tax/VAT/GST calculations, and a seamless checkout experience.
View startup

value.title: Velin AI: F**k interview-coder apps – Use real-time AI in screen calls undetected for ANY USECASE
value.content:
Velin is a click-through AI desktop app, invisible in screen calls, that delivers real-time AI responses on whatever you're doing without disrupting your flow. Unlike other tools that require constant prompting, Velin AI stays on screen and adapts to whatever you’re doing—whether it’s a live interview, online test, coding session, sales call, or even gaming. You can create or select from specialized AI setups, save transcripts and notes instantly, and run multiple AI jobs in parallel. Fully undetectable in calls, meetings, and recordings, Velin AI is the ultimate productivity companion for anyone in high-pressure, high-performance situations.
View startup

value.title: MindMirror – It’s not just a note app; it’s your quick-access memory assistant
value.content:
MindMirror is a note-taking app built for people who want answers, not folders.
Just drop in a note, upload a file, or import from other apps, no organizing required. Ask MindMirror any question, and it searches your entire knowledge base to give you answers instantly.
View startup

value.title: BestLanding – Turn Your Traffic Into 2X More Customers
value.content:
Every month, founders waste thousands on ads that lead to landing pages that don't convert. 
BestLanding fixes this. Our AI Test Engine automatically finds the exact headlines that turn your visitors into customers.
Here's how it works:
→ Add one line of code (60 seconds)
→ Let AI generate variations or add your own
→ Watch conversions climb in real-time
Most founders see 2X more signups in 7-14 days, without spending another dollar on ads. 
Try it free. No credit card required.
View startup

value.title: BookingTerminal – The Modern Booking Platform for Tour & Activity Operators
value.content:
BookingTerminal is a modern booking platform built for tour and activity operators. Legacy systems burden operators with clunky dashboards, generic support, and rising costs—distracting them from running their business. BookingTerminal simplifies powerful online booking tools into a clean, intuitive experience, backed by high-touch, personalized support. Operators can easily accept real-time bookings, streamline operations, and focus on delivering great experiences—not troubleshooting software. All this comes at a lower-than-average 3% online booking fee, making BookingTerminal the modern choice for the current and next generation of operators.
View startup

value.title: Did I Reply? – Free Gmail Reminders & Templates
value.content:
Did I Reply? is a Chrome extension that helps you set follow-up reminders and insert reusable email templates directly inside Gmail.
View startup
